pageProduct.name: Avene Cleanance Mattifying Emulsion 40ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Daily mattifying emulsion for oily, blemish-prone skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes. Proven tolerance on oily, acne-prone skin.

Common Uses

Mattifying and hydrating emulsion specifically designed for skin suffering from excess sebum production. Regulates the hyperproduction of sebum and immediately mattifies. Excellent make-up base.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). PROPYLENE GLYCOL. CYCLOPENTASILOXANE. GLYCERIN. CYCLOHEXASILOXANE. POLYACRYLATE-13. POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE. POLYISOBUTENE. ZINC GLUCONATE. BENZOIC ACID. CAPRYLYL GLYCOL. CETRIMONIUM BROMIDE. DIMETHICONE. DIMETHICONOL. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). GLYCERYL LAURATE. POLYSORBATE 20. PYRIDOXINE HCL. SALICYLIC ACID. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. WATER (AQUA).

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening after cleansing with Cleanance cleansing gel or Cleanance micellar water, and toning with Cleanance Mat toner.
